WRITING.TEXT: The use of UPC and EAN numbers has become so widespread that most retailers refuse to carry/sell a product without a UPC/EAN number. Most stores (online or otherwise) use whats called a POS (point of sale) system. Basically, this is the point or place where a purchasing transaction occurs and money is exchanged for a service or product. This generally occurs at the register or check out location.
